video_prompt: A female figure's hair and dress subtly billow. Two swans glide, creating ripples in the water. Yellow flowers gently sway. Reflections shimmer from structures. Mist subtly moves across mountain peaks. Fluffy clouds drift across a blue sky.
image_prompt: Vibrant digital painting of a serene lakeside Alpine village. A lone woman with long teal hair in a white dress sits on a wooden pier, gazing at two white swans on crystal-clear blue-green water with floating yellow flowers. Dark-roofed village buildings reflect on the water, against a backdrop of mist-shrouded green mountains and a bright blue, cloudy sky. Predominantly cool blues and greens, with pops of yellow.
refined_video_prompt: A female figure's hair and dress subtly billow. Swans glide, stirring ripples across the water's surface. Yellow flowers gently sway. Structures cast shimmering reflections. Mist subtly drifts across mountain peaks, as fluffy clouds traverse the blue sky.
